ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
Notes: e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2; Morning, At Bedtime

ElementDescription: Form used/assessment name
Notes: e.g., Self-Report, Parent Form, Short Form, Revised Version

ElementDescription: I would not leave a situation because I had uncomfortable physical sensations in my body.
Notes: 1= Not typical at all; 3=Somewhat typical; 5=Very typical; -999=NA/Missing/Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: When I feel uncomfortable in a situation I prefer to stay until the feelings pass
Notes: 1= Not typical at all; 3=Somewhat typical; 5=Very typical; -999=NA/Missing/Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: When I feel uncomfortable I can recognize that these are just feelings that will pass without having to do anything.
Notes: 1= Not typical at all; 3=Somewhat typical; 5=Very typical; -999=NA/Missing/Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I would not leave a situation just because I had a negative thought about bad things that could happen
Notes: 1= Not typical at all; 3=Somewhat typical; 5=Very typical; -999=NA/Missing/Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: If I am concerned about an upcoming situation, then I just won't go.
Notes: 1= Not typical at all; 3=Somewhat typical; 5=Very typical; -999=NA/Missing/Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I rarely avoid situations because I feel uncomfortable.
Notes: 1= Not typical at all; 3=Somewhat typical; 5=Very typical; -999=NA/Missing/Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I would not leave a situation because I felt uncomfortable.
Notes: 1= Not typical at all; 3=Somewhat typical; 5=Very typical; -999=NA/Missing/Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I can easily recognize when thoughts about something bad happening are 'just thoughts' that I don't need to respond to.
Notes: 1= Not typical at all; 3=Somewhat typical; 5=Very typical; -999=NA/Missing/Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I make excuses to get out of uncomfortable situations.
Notes: 1= Not typical at all; 3=Somewhat typical; 5=Very typical; -999=NA/Missing/Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I will think of ways to get out of uncomfortable situations as soon as I can.
Notes: 1= Not typical at all; 3=Somewhat typical; 5=Very typical; -999=NA/Missing/Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I often push myself to do things despite feeling uncomfortable about them
Notes: 1= Not typical at all; 3=Somewhat typical; 5=Very typical; -999=NA/Missing/Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: When I am uncomfortable about a particular situation, I plan how to escape.
Notes: 1= Not typical at all; 3=Somewhat typical; 5=Very typical; -999=NA/Missing/Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I avoid uncomfortable situations at all cost.
Notes: 1= Not typical at all; 3=Somewhat typical; 5=Very typical; -999=NA/Missing/Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I will go into a situation even if I feel uncomfortable about it.
Notes: 1= Not typical at all; 3=Somewhat typical; 5=Very typical; -999=NA/Missing/Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: When I have a negative thought about something bad happening, then I do something to prevent it.
Notes: 1= Not typical at all; 3=Somewhat typical; 5=Very typical; -999=NA/Missing/Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: When I notice uncomfortable physical sensations in my body, I do something to get rid of them.
Notes: 1= Not typical at all; 3=Somewhat typical; 5=Very typical; -999=NA/Missing/Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: When I feel uncomfortable I use strategies that I think will keep me safe
Notes: 1= Not typical at all; 3=Somewhat typical; 5=Very typical; -999=NA/Missing/Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: AcSEAS-17 Acceptance Subscale
Notes: Sum of acseas1, acseas2, acseas3, acseas4, acseas6, acseas7, acseas8, acseas11, acseas14

ElementDescription: AcSEAS-17 Safety Behaviors Subscale
Notes: Sum of acseas15, acseas16, acseas17

ElementDescription: AcSEAS-17 Escape/Avoidance Subscale
Notes: Sum of acseas5, acseas9, acseas10, acseas12, acseas13
